itunes:title: Episode 352 - DB Sports Companion Show 10/04/18 - Special Guest The Original Brosman Of The Year Winner Jimi Long
title: Episode 352 - DB Sports Companion Show 10/04/18 - Special Guest The Original Brosman Of The Year Winner Jimi Long
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Urban Meyer retiring, how the CFP got the final 4 teams wrong in the college playoffs as well as our prediction for the winner, who will win the Heisman Trophy, the draw between Fury/Wilder, and the spreads for thi...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Urban Meyer retiring, how the CFP got the final 4 teams wrong in the college playoffs as well as our prediction for the winner, who will win the Heisman Trophy, the draw between Fury/Wilder, and the spreads for this week's college football (Army vs Navy) and NFL games.  We are joined by the original Brosman Trophy Winner Jimi Long.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Urban Meyer retiring, how the CFP got the final 4 teams wrong in the college playoffs as well as our prediction for the winner, who will win the Heisman Trophy, the draw between Fury/Wilder, and the spreads for this week's college football (Army vs Navy) and NFL games.  We are joined by the original Brosman Trophy Winner Jimi Long.
